text:
I use Microsoft tools that detect password spray attacks, when I get notified I
investigate. Does Microsoft not use their own tools? Do they not have a SOC who
follows up? Are they under staffed? 
Take care, 
Anthony Meluso
Director of Technology
Watchung Hills Regional High School
108 Stirling Rd.
Warren, NJ 07059
908-647-4800 Ext. 4962

metadata.topic: RE: More on the Midnight blizzard

metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from ameluso@whrhs.org. Learn why this is important
[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
I use Microsoft tools that detect password spray attacks, when I get notified I
investigate. Does Microsoft not use their own tools? Do they not have a SOC who
follows up? Are they under staffed? 
Take care, 
Anthony Meluso

108 Stirling Rd.
Warren, NJ 07059
